summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3543, for the improvement of the alley in block 6, University Park Addition, being the alley between 17th Avenue Northeast and 18th Avenue Northeast, from East 50th Street to East 52nd Street, under Ordinance No. 43796, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
